content: Hariharan Narayanan â€” STCS, TIFR Quick links Teaching (CSS.404.1) Open course page CV Download PDF Scholar Google Scholar About I am a faculty member in the TIFR STCS unit. My research explores geometric and probabilistic aspects of high-dimensional phenomena, including the spectral geometry of random matrices. Contact Email: hariharan.narayanan [at] tifr [dot] res [dot] in STCS, Tata Institute of Fundamental ResearchHomi Bhabha Road, Colaba, Mumbai 400005, India Research interests Manifold learning Random hives and their connections to free probability Convex geometry, Markov chains Publications For a complete list, see Google Scholar.
